name: One Man's Trash
description:
My Ludum Dare 42 Compo entry. 48 hours, solo, all assets made on the fly. Vote for it here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/one-mans-treasure

Pitch:

You are very picky with the stuff you like to keep. You focus on one colour at a time only! Click on the wrongly coloured stuff to remove it. Keep the good stuff in the box!
